casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Strothers, Appellant, v. Gorden, Mayor, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Strothers v. Gorden (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 436.]

*437(No. 98-1208 Submitted August 19, 1998 Decided October 28, 1998.) Gerald O. Strothers, Jr. ', pro se.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
